articles.author: Dan Sales
articles.title: Ex-barrister's told awards do 'sleeping with a woman from Paisley would make a man's d**k itch' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The ex-barrister dropped after alleged 'sexist, racist and homophobic' jokes at an awards do said it 'smelled of Fake Bake' and declared women from Paisley gave men STDs, it was claimed today.
articles.content: The ex-barrister dropped as a speaker after alleged 'sexist, racist and homophobic' jokes at an awards do said it 'smelled of Fake Bake' and declared women from Paisley gave men STDs, it was claimed … [+6437 chars]
